Description: Sterling Musicman SR50 Stingray 6 String Electric Guitar - Black w/Soft Gig Bag Click images to enlarge Description We Are Unlimited-Goods Sterling Musicman SR50 Stingray 6 String Electric Guitar - Black w/Soft Gig Bag​ The StingRay SR50 harkens back to the first, original Fender Music Man guitar design, now reimagined and updated by the Ernie Ball Music Man design team. It features 2 creamy Ernie Ball Music Man spec humbuckers, Vintage Tremolo, and an oversized 4 + 2 headstock with locking tuning machines. VINTAGE STYLING The StingRay SR50 harkens back to the first, original Fender Music Man guitar design, now reimagined and updated by the Ernie Ball Music Man design team. 22 frets, 2 creamy Ernie Ball Music Man spec humbuckers, Vintage Tremolo, and an oversized 4 + 2 headstock with locking tuning machines. Features Body Wood: African Mahogany Neck Wood: Hard Maple Fretboard Wood: Rosewood  Details Scale: 25.5” Nut Width: 42mm Neck Width,12th fret: 52mm Body Wood: African Mahogany Neck Wood: Hard Maple Fretboard Wood: Rosewood Tuning Machines: Locking Hardware: Chrome Neck Joint: 5 Bolt Frets: 22 Fretboard Radius: 12” Pickup Selector: 3 Way Pickups: 2 Ernie Ball Music Man Spec Pickups Bridge: Vintage Tremolo Country of Origin: China DOES NOT INCLUDE TREMOLO BAR Included In This Auction: Musicman SR50 Sterling Stingray 6 String Electric Guitar - Black Road Runner Soft Gig Bag Condition: Guitar is in excellent working and cosmetic condition with some minor scratching on the back and front as well as some minor scratching on the pick guard form previous use and storage. There is a spot on the inside of the case where the stitching hits the guitar head. See pictures for details.
